DOC.detailed_description: The study design evaluate efficacy SFP-containing dialysate solution maintain physiological iron level chronic hemodialysis , measure primary endpoint percent patient whose Hemoglobin ( Hgb ) decrease least 1.0 gram/ deciliter ( g/dL ) baseline . The efficacy safety finding use determine optimal concentration SFP need safely maintain iron level , compensate iron loss chronic hemodialysis .
